attributes.action: Deport Muslims who preach Hatred of Christians & Jews.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I t is quite intolerable that speakers can go, as seen on C4 "Dispatches" to , for instance,20, Green Lane Mosque in Birmingham and preach Race Hatred & extermination of Christians & Jews,  & taking over of  OUR Govt .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
